author: Predeactor
end_user_data_statement: This cog store data about users persistently for saving datas. Red may store your discord ID with your data you set and receive.
description: Send a letter to someone you want to talk to.
install_msg:
Thank for installing Letters.
I'll be super honest: use it for spam or any others purpose that is it not intended for, and if I notice it, you can believe that I'll do everything to block your bot from using this cog.
This is my right to do so and I take the liberty to do it without prior notice.
